qas.question: What is the center of North Carolina called?
Where is the Krispy kreme headquarters located?
What city is the North Carolina Zoo in?
How many miles of shaded pathways does the Nort Carolina Zoo have?
What North Carolina City hosts the Merlefest?

context: <a0_0><a1_0>The Piedmont Triad<a1_0/><a0_0/>, or center of the state, is home to Krispy Kreme, Mayberry, Texas Pete, the Lexington Barbecue Festival, and Moravian cookies. The internationally acclaimed North Carolina Zoo in <a2_0>Asheboro<a2_0/> attracts visitors to its animals, plants, and a 57-piece art collection along <a3_0>five<a3_0/> miles of shaded pathways in the world's largest-land-area natural-habitat park. Seagrove, in the central portion of the state, attracts many tourists along Pottery Highway (NC Hwy 705). MerleFest in <a4_0>Wilkesboro<a4_0/> attracts more than 80,000 people to its four-day music festival; and Wet 'n Wild Emerald Pointe water park in Greensboro is another attraction.
